navbar.share_project_desc1: In order to be able to work collaboratively, you must download the project and then share it with your collaborators via a service such as IPFS, Google Drive or WeTransfer.
navbar.share_project_desc2: Thus, your collaborators will be able to import the project on their side in order to benefit from your changes.
